Title: Mujeres insumisas

Plot: Tired of being mistreated by their husbands, Ema (Reyes Spindola), Clotilde (Elizarraras), and Chayo (Orozco) leave their families and begin an adventure that takes them to a cavernous cabaret in Guadalajara, a love affair with a ...
